EmailTemplate.name: GCE Connect Email Template for Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Inquiry Confirmation {!Case.Subject} - {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Date: {!Case.Today_Date__c} Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Internal Inquiry Confirmation Information Only - No action required
Dear {!Case.Requested_By_HON_Internal__c},
We have received your inquiry: {!Case.Subject}. We are processing your request.
Please reference this case tracking number in any future correspondence: {!Case.CaseNumber}{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c} We will be back in touch with you no later than 2 business days.
Try our new GCE Connect site for faster routing of your next request. We will be migrating to this site exclusively in early May 2021 for all internal help request to Order Management. Click the link below to check us out.
GCE Connect
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support
